mapper.update: update user set username = #{username},roleId = #{roleId},lastname=#{lastname},photo = #{photo},sex = #{sex},age = #{age},address = #{address},areaId = #{areaId} where id = #{id}
update user set password = #{password} where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from user where id in(${value})
mapper.select: SELECT m.* FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN role sru on u.roleid=sru.id LEFT JOIN authority r on sru.id=r.roleid LEFT JOIN menu m on r.menuid=m.id where u.id = #{id}
